contents:
Sehr geehrter Herrn Goebbels,

Wie geht's dir? How about the brandnew status about Coronavirus-defending in your country? Does everything go well? Dies your president recieved the coins-spraying by our emperor?

Do you know that we just had a fun festival that calls "Duan-Niu" （端牛）
It's said that there was a patriotic poet who drowned himself into a river. This river is called "Jiang" in our mother tongue.

On the other hand, I present you a subculture that is called "Toad-worshipping". We worship a former leader of PRC (Jiang Zemin) to oppose the current leader.

The Zhihu.com was a huge toad-worshipping hub. One of members (贺仙) dared to use this culture to oppose our government. One day, he wrote "I love this patriot-poet, because he downed himself into the Jiang. (Literally: 我喜欢屈原，因为他晚年投江。）" This user was lucky, he never got a warning even he did hidden Toad-worshipping - However, he finally got a present from Zhihu-moderator: Force to silence into 7 days.

Apprently you won't want to come to China, not having this fun with us. Otherwise you might get whole shit spraying on your face. Ah Shit on your face.

Well, please excuse me that I have to improvise just like I (pretent that) don't have any available scripts by hand：
Mon tres cher ami, 我很抱歉要说那. Merci beaucoup!

Sincerely yours,

Hellas

25.June.2020
